Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
public class Player extends Object
This is the Player class for the farming simulator game for MCO2.

Methods include player actions for the game; scattering rocks, advancing to the next day, using the different available tools, registering different farmer types, planting seeds, harvesting crops, and getting/returning the class' attributes.
